prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a floating head and a serene appearance.
Imagine a legendary creature with ethereal features and a calming presence.
Generate a small Pokemon that embodies wisdom and tranquility with unique tentacle-like extensions.
Show me a mythical Pokemon that has a golden aura and blue accents.
Design a Pokemon with a round, golden head and graceful, flowing body.
Make a creature that symbolizes knowledge and has a mystical, serene vibe.
Give me a Pokemon with a peaceful demeanor and a connection to the mind.
